Lines.Text: My name is Alistair, soon to be King Alistair I, of...
My "deal", as you put it, is that I am the rightful King of this land.
I await the hour of liberty, when my birthright is recognised and I an free to claim my crown.

Dialogue.Prompt: When, exactly, is the hour of liberty?

Lines.Text: The hour of liberty is the coming of the new dawn! The birth of true justice, freedom, and democracy!
When... well, I mean, it will happen when the time is just!
You can't rush these things, you know.

Dialogue.Prompt: Democracy? Didn't you say you were going to be King?

Lines.Text: Yes, of a rightly constitutional parliamentary democracy.
Checks and balances, separation of powers, all that.
Rightful Kings of the realm can be decent people as well you know!
